channel.title: [508] working Mute & Ip Mute Command

item.title: [508] working Mute & Ip Mute Command
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

here is my mute command:

				if (cmd[0].equals("mute")) {
					String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
					Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
					if (p2 != null) {
						p2.muteType++;
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have successfuly muted "+victim+".");
						p.updateReq = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
					}
				}
				if (cmd[0].equals("unmute")) {
					String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
					Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
					if (p2 != null) {
						p2.muteType--;
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have successfuly unmuted "+victim+".");
						p.updateReq = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
					}
				}
			}

and it does not seem to mute the player.

also does any one know a tut or a code for a ip mute?

Thanks In Advance!

Brandon[/code]
